file_content.text: I caught one of the thugs working for the Exchange.
Sama Zo? You posted a bounty contract?
Yes. I have learned that offworlders solve problems for credits.
The Exchange is our problem. Thieves and killers, led by an offworlder: Eryn Talosa.
Stop the Exchange. I will pay.
Your problems with the Exchange end today.
I'll make it happen.
Killing Exchange goons is no problem for me.
Consider them corpses.
The Voss aren't defenseless. Couldn't your commandos deal with a few criminals like these?
Why not stop them yourself?
Good.
Offworlder problem. Offworlder solution.
Take my data. Find the killers. End the Exchange on Voss.
All die when it is their time.
You have one less Exchange thug to worry about.
We will carry out punishment.
You have killed. So be it.
Thank you. Take your credits.
I understand we've located the Exchange leader on your world--Eryn Talosa.
Correct. She steals ancient stones, kills any who interfere. Calls it all "art".
Find Talosa at the uncovered coordinates. End her killing.
Here you are: Eryn Talosa, alive and captured.
You are skillful. Such help is appreciated.
Eryn Talosa is dead. The Exchange won't be troubling Voss again for a while, at least.
That will be good. Thank you.
Your credits are prepared. Travel safely.
